feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 1, 09:00 - 11:00 UTC

May 30, 22:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 01/08/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 01/08/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [ERI1C][VMware Private Cloud] - Datastore maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 28, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 31, 16:00 UTC

Jun 25, 20:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 28/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 31/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a micro cut if the customer is writing a lot on their datastore.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG2A][Managed vSphere] - Equipment update notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 21, 11:30 - 21:00 UTC

Jun 24, 20:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 21/07/2025 11:30 UTC
End time : 21/07/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : During the operation, customers may experience a few seconds of slowness when reading from or writing to their datastore.
However, there will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability or virtual machines.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 21, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 24, 16:00 UTC

Jun 25, 20:25 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.
This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 21/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 24/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere not accesible for 1h and hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the maintenance and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers and you can reschedule through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 15, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 17, 16:00 UTC

Jun 25, 20:24 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 15/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour.
vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 7, 07:00 UTC  -  Jul 10, 16:00 UTC

Jun 25, 20:17 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 07/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 10/07/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance, vSphere won't be accessible and hosts will be put in maintenance mode for 1 hour.
vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding
